achievements: Upgraded a system from dot net framework 4.x to dot net 6.
Upgraded a system from dot net framework 4.x to dot net 6.
Created an Azure Devops YAML pipeline for continuous deployment of the system above.
Developed a dot net 6 C# RESTful Web API.
Worked on a Windows Forms app to consume the Web API.
Integrated the Web API and Forms App with Azure Service Bus and SignalR.
Retrospectively added Unit Tests to the Web API and Forms App.
roles.description: As a doofer at Tredz blah blah blah
roles.summary: Microservices, RESTful Web API, C#, Dot Net 6, XUnit, Moq, EF Core, YAML
